title: Top Places to visit in Kamareddy, Telangana
content:
Kamareddy is a town and headquarters of eponymous district in Telangana state in India.
Kamareddy district is located in the northern region of the Indian state of Telangana..The district shares boundaries with Medak, Nizamabad, Sangareddy, Siddipet and Rajanna Sircilla districts.

title: Top Places to visit in Jogulamba Gadwal, Telangana
content:
Jogulamba Gadwal district is a district in the Indian state of Telangana. The administrative headquarters of the district is located at Gadwal.

title: Top Places to visit in Jayashankar Bhupalpally, Telangana
content:
Jayashankar Bhupalpally is a district in the Indian state of Telangana. The district headquarters are located at Bhupalpally. It was a part of the Warangal district prior to the re-organisation of districts in the state.

title: Top Places to visit in Jangaon, Telangana
content: Jangaon is a town and the district headquarters of Jangaon district in the Indian state of Telangana. title: Top Places to visit in Jagtial, Telangana
content: Jagtial is a City and the district headquarters Jagtial district of Telangana, India. It has an average elevation of 293 metres (961 ft)..It is located about 190 kilometres (118 mi) north of the state capital Hyderabad, 49 kilometres (30 mi) from Karimnagar and 99 kilometres (62 mi) from Nizamaba

title: Top Places to visit in Hyderabad, Telangana
content: Hyderabad District is a district in the state of Telangana in India that contains a part of the metropolitan area of Hyderabad. Top Places to visit in Komaram Bheem, Telangana
content: Komaram Bheem (22 October 1901 – 27 October 1940) was a tribal leader who fought against the Asaf Jahi Dynasty for the liberation of Hyderabad. Komaram Bheem openly fought against the ruling Nizam government in a guerrilla campaign. He defied courts, laws, and any other form of Nizam author

title: Top Places to visit in Adilabad, Telangana
content: Adilabad, a municipality, and the headquarters of Adilabad district, is a city in Adilabad district of the Indian state of Telangana.
